abstract: Obtain a reference to a dock accessory and receive notifications about its state.
overview:
## Return Value

A value that indicates the dock accessory that changed and its new state.

## Discussion

A docking or undocking notification occurs when a person docks or removes a device such as iPhone from a compatible dock accessory. The notification is a prequisite for modifying the tracking behavior of a dock accessory. For more information on controlling a dock accessory, see [doc://com.apple.DockKit/documentation/DockKit/DockAccessory].

The following code demonstrates how to iterate through the accessory state changes to obtain the dock accessory.
title: accessoryStateChanges
